testproblem.name: Standing free surface wave in channel using P1DG-P2.

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import fluidity_tools det=fluidity_tools.stat_parser('standing_wave.detectors') g=10.0 fsl=det['Water']['Pressure']['Left']/g t=det['ElapsedTime']['value'] fs_left={} fs_left['min']=fsl.min() fs_left['min_time']=t[fsl.argmin()] fs_left['end_value']=fsl[-1]

import fluidity_tools det=fluidity_tools.stat_parser('standing_wave.detectors') g=10.0 fsr=det['Water']['Pressure']['Right']/g t=det['ElapsedTime']['value'] fs_right={} fs_right['max']=fsr.max() fs_right['max_time']=t[fsr.argmax()] fs_right['end_value']=fsr[-1]
